segments.text: Where do you usually do your shopping , Mrs . Lane ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I usually go to the supermarket , near the station .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do you find the prices there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think they are quite reasonable , and the vegetables are very fresh .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see you have bought some coffee . Would you mind telling me how much you paid for it ?
segments.speaker: S1
